Train Wreck was hit by all of the shots again and decided that enough was e=
nough. He let a huge, monstrous cannon unfold from his back. So big and dea=
dly it would be illegal to fire more than 1 shot in a post (work with me he=
re). Unless this thing was dodged, it was going to do some damage, at least=
 the damage of 5 or 6 missiles. He launches it at Electronet...

aur and one missle at Aquataur's back.
